about_the_game:
"FlyBye" is a unique and emotional adventure game that follows the story of Harold, a World War I veteran and retired aerial photographer who embarks on a final journey to fulfill his recently deceased wife's last request. As Harold, you take to the skies in your trusty biplane with the urn of your wife's ashes in the back seat, navigating through a world filled with wonder, beauty, and the memories of your past.

As you fly across the landscapes, you'll encounter old memories and make new ones, revisiting moments from your past and creating new experiences to cherish. With each passing moment, you'll explore stunning and diverse environments, from soaring over lush forests and rolling hills to soaring through the clouds and watching the sun set on the horizon.

Along the way, you'll encounter various challenges and obstacles, navigating treacherous terrain and overcoming the elements to keep your journey on track. But as you journey further and deeper into the world, you'll discover the true meaning of love, life, and the importance of cherishing every moment.

With its heartwarming story, breathtaking visuals, and unique gameplay mechanics, "FlyBye" is a game that will leave a lasting impression on players of all ages. Soaring through the skies with your wife by your side, you'll embark on an unforgettable journey of love, loss, and self-discovery.
